entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 a.m. MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Snow near Lake Louise. Snow level rising to 1800 metres this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm near Lake Louise. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow near Lake Louise early this evening. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
